document_data.caption: A map showing the River Amarast on the Chultan Peninsula.
document_data.name: River Amarast
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Amarast''' wound through the jungles of [[Tashalar]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: Originating in the [[Delphin Mountains]], the River Amarast flowed southeast for approximately {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} before emptying into the [[Lapal Sea]] in the heart of the jungle. It was the largest river in the jungle feeding the Lapal Sea.
